mapper.select: select userID, userName, message, to_char(messageDate, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') messageDate from message where projectName = #{projectName} AND to_char(messageDate, 'DD') = to_char(sysdate, 'DD') order by messageSeq desc

SELECT u.userID userID , u.userName , u.userPW , u.userBirth , u.USERPHONE , p.projectName FROM usertable u , project p , joinproject jp WHERE u.userID = jp.userID AND p.projectSeq = jp.projectSeq AND #{value} = p.projectName
